name: libbase58
summary: C library for Bitcoin's base58 encoding
description:
libbase58 is a C library for Bitcoin's base58 encoding. base58 is a modified
version of base64 that avoids both non-alphanumeric characters and
letters which might look ambiguous when printed". The particular scheme
used in this library omits the following characters: numeral zero, capital i,
capital o, lowercase l and the signs '+' and '/'.
